WelcomeToDIE
Running shot on his 1st 2 clicks and combat reflexes on his last 2 would have sold this guy for me. As it is, we'll see what the next set has to offer as far as new scale Caps go.
April 27, 2022
nlegore
I feel what people need to realize about this figure is that he is not a primary attacker. Make use of his S.H.I.E.L.D. TA from range, and then when the opponent closes the gap to attack your bigger gun, have Cap Charge in and finish the figure off. Granted, l wish he was cheaper but l see potential in this figure.
March 19, 2022
Bobcat2022
Among the incredible run of power-common Avengers in this set, Cap here feels like he’s missing something. Maybe a trait that gives out ESD, to go along with the Miles, Natasha and Bruce commons? Maybe some kind of Rally Die mechanic, to go with T’Challa and Eric Brooks? I dunno. I’m glad they made him a different shade of blue than usual, and than the Uncommon. That’s interesting, at least.
